trait.name: Flyby (Air Only)
entries: The spirit doesn't provoke {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
entries: The spirit has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the spirit's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
entries: The spirit can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} Piercing damage.
